#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int main(){
int T;
char s1[100005],s2[100005],S[100005];;
scanf("%d",&T);
int len1,len2,i,j,carry,v,tmp;
while(T--){
	scanf("%s %s",s1,s2);
	len1=strlen(s1);
	len2=strlen(s2);
	v=0;
	carry=0;
	for(i=len1-1,j=len2-1;i>=0 && j>=0;i--,j--){		
		tmp=s1[i]+s2[j]-130+carry;
		carry=tmp/26;
		S[v]=65+tmp%26;
		v++;
	}
	while(i>=0){tmp=s1[i]-65+carry;carry=tmp/26;S[v]=65+(tmp%26);i--;v++;}
	while(j>=0){tmp=s2[j]-65+carry;carry=tmp/26;S[v]=65+(tmp%26);j--;v++;}
	if(carry){S[v]=carry+65;v++;}
	S[v]='\0';
	for(i=strlen(S)-1;i>=0;i--)putchar_unlocked(S[i]);printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
